Introduction

Han Sang Hyuk, popularly known as Hyuk, is a South Korean singer and actor under Companion Company. He made his official debut in May 2012 as the maknae of the boy group VIXX under Jellyfish Entertainment.

On June 1, 2022 Hyuk released a heartfelt letter announcing to fans that he would be leaving Jellyfish Entertainment to pursue solo activities elsewhere. Despite of this, he will not be leaving VIXX.
